org.youscope.plugin.nemesys

Interface NemesysJob

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Component, Job, java.rmi.Remote, TableConsumer, TableProducer

    public interface NemesysJob
extends Job, TableConsumer, TableProducer
    Job to control the Nemesys syringe.
    Author:
    Moritz Lang

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getNemesysDeviceName()
      Returns the name of the Nemesys device.
      java.lang.String getScript()
      Returns the script which gets evaluated by the script engine every time the script runs.
      java.lang.String getScriptEngine()
      Returns the name of the script engine, or null, if script engine is not set.
      void setNemesysDeviceName(java.lang.String deviceName)
      Sets the name of the Nemesys device.
      void setScript(java.lang.String script)
      Sets the script which gets evaluated by the script engine every time the job runs.
      void setScriptEngine(java.lang.String engine)
      Sets the script engine with which the scripts should be evaluated.

        void setScriptEngine(java.lang.String engine)
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException,

        Parameters:
        engine - The script engine to use.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        MeasurementRunningException

      • getScriptEngine

        java.lang.String getScriptEngine()
                          throws java.rmi.RemoteException

        Returns:
        Script engine factory name.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • setScript

        void setScript(java.lang.String script)
        throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
               MeasurementRunningException
        Sets the script which gets evaluated by the script engine every time the job runs.
        Parameters:
        script - script to evaluate, following the rules of the chosen script engine.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        MeasurementRunningException

      • getNemesysDeviceName

        java.lang.String getNemesysDeviceName()
                               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns the name of the Nemesys device.
        Returns:
        Name of Nemesys device, or null if not set.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • setNemesysDeviceName

        void setNemesysDeviceName(java.lang.String deviceName)
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                          MeasurementRunningException
        Sets the name of the Nemesys device. If the device is not a Nemesys device, an error is thrown during job initialization.
        Parameters:
        deviceName - The name of the Nemesys device.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        MeasurementRunningException
